A journal capturing a life driven by curiosity and a desire for growth

I am Anastasia, a computer scientist with a passion for entrepreneurship and maths.

I built an app to help kids learn to handwrite Rito Kids and a platform to make access to qualitative education in Romania more accessible Meditatii.ro. Check out The story of Rito Kids and The story of MateNow.ro, turned Meditatii.ro.
